about_the_game:
[Season Pass Content] (Planned to be released by the end of September 2021)
- DLC 1st Wave
Additional Horse "Iron Coat"
Additional Horse "Silver Coat"
Additional Horse "Armor Coat"
Additional Weapon Set 1
Additional Weapon Set 2
Additional Scenario & BGM Set 1
Additional Scenario & BGM Set 2
Additional Scenario & BGM Set 3

- DLC 2nd Wave
Additional Horse "Ghost"
Additional Horse "Black Shadow"
Additional Horse "Qilin"
Additional Weapon Set 3
Additional Weapon Set 4
Additional Weapon Set 5
Additional Scenario & BGM Set 4
Additional Scenario & BGM Set 5
Additional Scenario & BGM Set 6

Note: Details about the DLC released with the Season Pass as well as their release period is announced. Please check the official website.
Note: Planned release dates are subject to change.
Note: DLC included in the Season Pass will be available for individual purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

[Season Pass Bonus]
■Content
30,000 "Stock EXP"
100,000 "Stock Weapon Mastery"
300 "Skill Points"

■How to use
Stock EXP: Stock EXP can be used to upgrade officers at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Dojo" - "Officer Training" - "Training".
Stock Weapon Mastery: Stock Weapon Mastery can be used to upgrade weapons at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Dojo" - "Officer Training" - "Increase Weapon Mastery".
Skill Points: Skill Points can be used to upgrade officers at My Castle in "Musou Mode" or "Citadel Mode" by selecting "Dojo" - "Officer Training" - "Acquiring Skills".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64bit / Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
  • Additional Notes: Set the graphics quality to Low from "Graphics". This will automatically adjust the settings to 30 FPS @ 1280x720.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
  • Additional Notes: Set the graphics quality to High from "Graphics". This will automatically adjust the settings to 60 FPS @ 1920x1080.
